Red wine sauce

Cheap, simple and delicious red wine sauce to accompany red meats

Home page

Ingredients

  • 20cL Red wine Butter Shallots Red Meat Pinch of sugar Salt Hint of pepper Parsley Cognac (to flame)

Recipe

  1. Add 30 grams of butter to a non stick pan
  2. Add all the sliced shallots and make them sweat on low heat (no coloration)
  3. Keep the shallots on the side
  4. Reserve the shallots on the side
  5. Get rid of the excess oil

Notes
